Churches, that is, appropriate places for Christian vvorship both in, and ever since the Apostles times. A discourse at first more briefly delivered in a colledge chappell, and since enlarged. By Joseph Mede, B.D. and fellow of Christs Colledge in Cambridge. Mede, Joseph, 1586-1638.
[6], 74 p.
Printed by M[iles] F[lesher] for John Clark, and are to be sold at his shop under St Peters Church in Cornhill, London : M DC XXXVIII. [1638]
Printer's name from STC. The first leaf is blank. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
